titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include service during World War II in the United States merchant marine as military service for purposes of the civil service retirement system.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, OPM.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Includes service in the U.S. merchant marine between May 26, 1940, and January 1, 1948, as military service for the purpose of determining civil service retirement benefits.
